website_summaries.verdict: Comfort, style and quality construction make Dakota the runaway favorite for indoor and occasional outdoor wear.
pros: Cozy wool lining keeps feet warm without overheating
Sheepskin moccasin with wool lining, molded rubber outsole
cons: Dye from dark jeans can rub off and discolor slippers

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Perfection From Always A+ Brand Uggtastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection!! Great price for an outstanding product. I wear a ladies 6.5 to 7 and ordered the big kids size 5 and the fit is SPOT ON!! Been wearing Uggs for 9 years and never have I actually paid the higher price for the actual ladies version. Unexpected bonus to these moccasins is that the leather laced tie is actually sewn in. If you've ever owned any other type of moc once they come untied they never look the same. Not to mention the leather laces eventually end up snapping from the constant tug of redoing the tie. Not ever going to be the case here!!! LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: TMM

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time and are warm
customer_reviews.text: I loved these slippers i had them for about 4 Los Angeles winters. They just recently gave up on me so I have moved on to another style but these are great. The grippers on the soles are perfect for all surfaces and I can be anywhere in the house with them even in the garage laundry room changing a load. the color is great and they honestly didnt stain until this last year. I have been very happy with this slipper. The new ones I bought are these with a tiny ball of fur in the middle close to the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying slippers upon slippers without finding the right one. I spent so much money over the years that I could kick myself. Why I waited so long , to try UGG, is beyond me! I have small feet so I was so glad to see that the kids size could fit my feet. I absolutely love my new slippers and I will never buy another brand ever again. They are so cozy, comfy and fit perfectly. Thank you UGG for producing such a wonder product.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Pesout

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME but.. Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: I got these originally in a size 4 for my daughter who wears a 2.5 or 3 in Converse and other shoes. The 4s were way too small (maybe because of the furry lining?) but the 5s are great. The shoes are adorable and super comfy so I would recommend them to anyone- just take the furry lining into account when choosing a size.
customer_reviews.author: Brainstorm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Comfortable Slipper
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable and cozy slipper. Yes, arriving at the correct size could be a challenge, but when you find your size and wear the slipper for a few days, it conforms to your foot and feels wonderful. I have a narrow foot, so size can be a problem. This particular style seems to be more conforming and forgiving than some of their other styles. It comes up higher on the top of the foot, so it tends to slip on the heal less. I doubt this would be a problem for those who have a wider foot.
customer_reviews.author: Retiredmsg

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure these are fake. UGG website said every pair of genuine UGGS has a QR code that can be scanned to determine legitimacy. Where the tag should be is a similar looking tag but no QR code. Also, the UGG logo on slippers does not have the trademark symbol. Shoulda used Zappos!
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: kids size fit women size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ugg slippers based on the review of others. It's exactly what they said. They are kid size 6, but fits as if it was an adult shoe size 8. At first they feel snug but, in a few days it starts to stretch and feels fine. I paid less than the women size. They are so comfortable. I wear them to work or when I pick up the kids from school and go for short errands.
customer_reviews.author: mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. They were perfect out of the box but have stretched a bit since so now they slide some in the heel fit. They are super warm and fuzzy. Worth your time! I am a size 7-7.5 womens and I got the size 5.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: I'm super bummed that the stitch on these popped at the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm super bummed that the stitch on these popped at the seam about a month after I had them. I had to take them to a show repair place and get them fixed. The string that holds the bow in place also fell off the first week, making it a pain to have to keep tying the bow. Otherwise, they are you basic ugg, insanely comfortable and very warm. I was just not happy about the quality - hopefully I just got a bad pair.
customer_reviews.author: Glucoze

customer_reviews.title: the lambs wool lining takes up room so your correct size might feel snug
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves them. It's too bad they don't have half sizes. She usually wares a 4 but I guess because of the lining they were too tight so we got the size 5 and they were a little too big but she manages to keep them on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kaya's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, looks great! Fit a little tight as expected, but after about a month they now are the perfect fit and wear them everyday as a house slipper, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Love these!  My splurge during pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these UGGs. These are my pandemic splurge! They are so super comfy and the fit is amazing! I am normally a women's size 8 and purchased the 6Y and they fit perfectly! These will be used very often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: After just a few weeks of minimal wear, these slippers I bought for my son for his (May) birthday to upgrade his usual cheapies are complete trash. The seam is almost ripped to the toe. Not the quality I expect from UGG...very disappointed I wasted my money on these. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M

customer_reviews.title: Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the toe box of one moccasin blew out in less than a month! Definitely not the quality I expected from Ugg.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart Within 35 Days
customer_reviews.text: Within 35 days the lacing along the seam of one shoe came apart. Didn't tear through the holes, just literally fell apart, came undone, etc. Less than expected. We'll pursue a refund or exchange. Hopeful for positive outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Attig

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware fake uggs
customer_reviews.text: I dont believe how awful these slippers. They keep ripping and falling apart. I believe these slippers are mot real authentic uggs they knocks offs!!
customer_reviews.author: Adham

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great cute slippers I had to go down 2 sizes for a perfect fit. They are extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnna G

customer_reviews.title: Fake uggs
customer_reviews.text: They are not authentic. No ugg label just in a ugg box. Will be returning and getting a refund Fake knock off fake....
customer_reviews.author: Khayla

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little tight
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a little tight but I ordered a child size 6 for my size 8 ladies foot to save a few dollars, they will stretch and other wise they are wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: kathi M

customer_reviews.title: Original uggs at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. These are original uggs and I purchased them at a great price. Will purchase from this seller again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Heaven
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are worth every penny! I am so happy with how comfortable and warm they are. In a women's shoe, I am a size 6. I ordered the kids 4 and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for Christmas and they are too cute! I’m normally a size 7 in women’s shoes and ordered the kids size six because I read reviews that they run small. The 6 fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Buerer

customer_reviews.title: Not real Ugg slippers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs of the Dakota slippers for my daughters. They were not real Ugg even though the price was the same. They were missing the registered trademark sign after Ugg.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: falling apart after two months
customer_reviews.text: these are a little tight still after wearing them for two months. i thought I just had to break them in. they are also falling apart and I do not wear them a lot, nor in crazy conditions. I'm really disappointed I've only had these two months and I'm worried they will not be wearable much longer. save your money, I wish I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This were bought for a 20 year old woman and they fit just like a size 7 womens shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs two or more sizes small!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expect UGGs to be a bit more dead on with their sizing. My daughter wears a 12/13 and I ordered a size 1 so that she would have some wiggle room, but it barely fits her at all. I expected better from UGGs.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Maree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend for Valentine's Day. She had wanted moccasins that matched mine since Christmas! She has small feet, so I was able to save a few bucks and purchase these for her. Very good quality - it currently fits a big snug, but I think it will eventually stretch out a little. I hope it will keep her toes warm for the years go come!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I received these on September 12th, it is now ...
customer_reviews.text: I received these on September 12th, it is now just a little over a month later and the seams of the shoe have ripped at the toe and has completely come apart. I have worn uggs for years and currently own about 8 pairs. I have never had this happen with a pair of Uggs. When I called Amazon, I was t
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfy
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! My feet are always cold, but I can wear these to work without socks and be fine all day!
customer_reviews.author: Book Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the child’s size 6 for my 7.5 adult feet. Perfect fit and less expensive. Inside is soft and plush and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: eeb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a women's size 7 and the size 5 fit perfect. They are cozy and warm. I got rid of all my other slippers, these are the shizzles.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to keep my toes warm, and they definitely do not disappoint. My feet are toasty, and comfortable inside the lambs wool. These shoes do have one design flaw. The designer has placed tags, which are used as the certificate of authenticity right where it rubs on the tender part of your foot. After four weeks of almost daily wear, the tags are finally less annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper for 10 year old nephew
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved them. Always a little afraid of knock offs but these were authentic
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: 1 month of my Neice wearing them around the house and the stitching ripped . A day after the return window
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Ugh Slippers
customer_reviews.text: We had to return just due to size... quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love my new slippers they fit great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and true to size. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Have been an ugg customs for many years. After wearing these about 6-7 times, the stitching unraveled. Very dissatisfied. Not what I have come to expect from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 4 was a little tight No problem with returned re order size 5 fits perfectly. Very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Get your size
customer_reviews.text: These were really cute. I do like them however, get your right size they do not run big and are to fit as expected. I looked at the reviews and alot of them were saying that they run big so go down a size. I did and although they fit, there isn't much room in them. But thank God they stretched a little with me wearing them a few hours. So I guess im still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Ripped and won’t refund
customer_reviews.text: Product ripped in less than a month and can not be returned due to asking past 30 days. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Martin

customer_reviews.title: Real Uggs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son and he loves them. These are real Uggs too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love my slippers
customer_reviews.text: fit was perfect. ordered a 6 and i am a 7.5 womens.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I wear a women's 6.5 and they fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Warm
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are super cute. My granddaughter loves them. The fur inside makes them so warm.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie of six

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Was a bit skeptical buying these on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Was a bit skeptical buying these on amazon. They are legit and the childrens size is perfect for women. Great deal
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: and it was just as i expected snug and a little difficult to put on but after a day of wear they fit perfect! I wear them at wor
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pairs of ugg boots so i purchased that same size i do in the bailey boots, and it was just as i expected snug and a little difficult to put on but after a day of wear they fit perfect! I wear them at work once i get to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Openshaw

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was very happy with and hasnt taken them off since Christmas
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE L. TROUPE

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly packaged just as I ordered them from Ugg’s themselves great color ! And handled with love and care till they got to me!
customer_reviews.author: shawnelle miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present and my sister loved them and fit perfect even though she has small feet. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: jelffery Duran

customer_reviews.title: Ugg slippers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these slippers when on the go... I buy a pair every year
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Berry

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these. She lived in them this winter. I wish they fit me, haha! I think I already know what will be on my Christmas list next year. :) UGG never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Momtomy5

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: I Love these I wear them everywhere when it starts to get cold keeps my feet so warm.
customer_reviews.author: tennille hall

customer_reviews.title: These are a little tighter than my other uggs but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a little tighter than my other uggs but I hope they stretch a little as they get worn in. I am afraid the next size up would be too big. Very warm and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S Brower

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE FAKE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t real Uggs! Don’t waste your money on them! 1 star was given only bc it made me!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I bought a knock off
customer_reviews.text: Within first few wears, the fabric started to split in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: order a size down
customer_reviews.text: overall excellent purchase but order a size down seem to run large.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair and I love them! I will forever buy these when my current ones wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Worse present ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece and she had them on for only 2 hours and they ripped.. disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jeaneen Holland

customer_reviews.title: Simply deelish
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are amazing. I have a pair and I bought these for my mother for Christmas. They are so well made and comfortable. I love it that they have a sole and you can wear them out of the house if you so desire. My mom and I both wear a women's size 7. The children's size 5 fits perfectly and is less expensive than buying the adult size. I have three pairs of UGG boots and love them. I don't normally spend so much on shoes, but they are worth every penny. Buy the slippers!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa2

customer_reviews.title: Comfort At Its Best
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived for my granddaughter she had the biggest smile.She was so excited and happy. They fit perfectly and are SOOOO Comfortable.These are replacements for ones she outgrew . And we were pleased with the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Dort

customer_reviews.title: Snug to begin with, but then a comfy fit
customer_reviews.text: UGGs tend to be a bit snug with the interior fresh out of the box. A few wears loosens the leather a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these slippers. Ordered almost a full size smaller for a good fit. Product had a great price and were received quickly!
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 in women's and these fit perfectly in a child's size 5. Love them as usual, very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These were a little tight in the toes but with a little stretch they are great. Love my uggs
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas. I did have to order her one size smaller than what she normally wears so this must run big. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love Ugg slippers especially these version. My last pair lasted me over 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: I love this website
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable Nd I wear these to school
customer_reviews.author: Lula

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I bought the big kids size 5, normally I am a 6.5 or 7 depending upon the make of the shoe. So comfortable and warm. I wear these inside and outside. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: mags

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if these are the real deal highly disappointed. Amazon was great at returning my money though
customer_reviews.text: Size not consistent with same shoes from store that sells authentic uggs... Not sure if these are the real deal highly disappointed. Amazon was great at returning my money though.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable slippers out there.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them now just trying to get her to not where them to school daily!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Size chart incorrect
customer_reviews.text: They do not fit the sizing chart I used. A lot bigger than expected. I do not have anything to be able to return th with so it will be more money for me to spend. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Snug at first, will conform!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! They'll feel snug initially, more so than the Ugg boots. After wearing for a couple of hours, the slipper will conform! Don't buy larger, as they'll slip off your heel after you 'break them in.'
customer_reviews.author: RFam5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved them but they ran small so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: pdub

customer_reviews.title: Love the Uggs
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old granddaughter wanted these Uggs as a b'day present. Even though they were pricey, we wanted to please and ordered them. They arrived quickly and she loved them. She has worn them lots. I was surprised they didn't come in an Ugg's shoe box but she didnt care & that is all that mattered!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter and she absolutely loves them! She'd wear them to school if I'd let her and is now wearing them out and about on the weekends. Deliberately bought them a size big so she doesn't grow out of them quite so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Rice

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY UGGS
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would splurge in these slippers. So glad I did. They are comfortable...lightweight & SO cute. I wear them also with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Tie broke only after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The tie broke off after only wearing the shoes a few weeks. Very unhappy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pray

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe... I am a 7.5 women's and the 6 fit perfect, however, I returned for the Ugg Ryder just based on preference.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows UGG quality. It is rare to find a deal on this name brand, but...I purchased these for my daughter and found that this particular color choice (chestnut) in children sizes was hard to find locally. I order these and within 5 days I received them with no tax and free shipping. My daughter never takes them off !
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The Size was a little large
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of Ugg Moccasins. One was a size 7 and the other a 6. This pair of the 6 was actually larger than the size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love My Uggies
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Fluffy. Cozy. Stylish. What more could you want? I wear my uggs everywhere & they are by far the best for quality. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bunker

customer_reviews.title: Love these..
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. Normal size 6, 6.5 and ordered these in 5. Soft, comfy.

customer_reviews.title: very pretty shoes
customer_reviews.text: If I just new it I will ordered a size less... very pretty shoes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ugg moccasins! Exactly what I ordered came, & on time. I will buy from this seller again. Thank you so much! Very happy -Shelley
customer_reviews.author: MaeMae17

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift....
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved these slippers...They were easy to order, came right on time....and were a big hit....Even though I think they are slippers...she hasn't taken them off yet!!!!

customer_reviews.title: love my uggs
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small foot (i'm 30 with a child size 4.5) and I'm so lucky ugg makes kid size in similar styles as woman slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L Elsesser

customer_reviews.title: They run 2 full sizes too large. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: They run 2 full sizes too large. I had to return and repurchase. Very comfy for me as a size 6, in 4.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for upcoming season!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes!! Super warm!! Great color! There is only one negative thing... The bow comes apart and if you don't tie it correctly it will keep coming part.

customer_reviews.title: Ugg Dakota casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wears size 5 child with all her other shoes. This was too big for her & will have to find an Ugg store near her area for an exchange.

customer_reviews.text: I got tired of using boots in the cold so I though this slippers will help and it actually did. It's very warm and confe, you can also walk comfortable. I totally recommend it!

Cushioning foam insole with UGG pure wool lining
